name: BindPath.Part
desc: An individual piece of a larger path that refers to the target of an animation.

items.name: case anchorEntity(String)
items.desc: A path component for the scene's anchor entity.

items.name: case entity(String)
items.desc: A path component for a nested entity.

items.name: case jointTransforms
items.desc: A path component to animate joint transforms.

items.name: case parameter(String)
items.desc: A path component to animate a named parameter.

items.name: case scene(String)
items.desc: A path component for a nested scene.

items.name: case transform
items.desc: A path component to animate a transform.

items.name: static func == (BindPath.Part, BindPath.Part) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two components of a bind path are equal.

items.name: static func != (BindPath.Part, BindPath.Part) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two components of a bind path aren't equal.
